titleStmt.title: The Nevvest intelligence from the army in Ireland in tvvo letters the one from the apothecary, formerly to the late Earl of Strafford, now to the said armie : and the other from a good hand, both dated in Dublin, Febr. 1, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Lynne, M.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to M. Lynne by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
